NK040(thi)043:1: // pha dam pa rgya gar gyi bskang ba rngam pa'i nga ro bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)043:2: pha dam pa'i bskang ba ni /
NK040(thi)043:6: thod chang mar khu la sogs thogs nas /
NK040(thi)043:7: dga' ba'i dbyangs dang bcas pas 'di skad brjod do //
NK040(thi)043:9: lho phyogs chen po b+he ti'i yul //
NK040(thi)043:10: tsha ri sing nga zhes bya'i gling //
NK040(thi)043:11: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs yul //
NK040(thi)043:12: gling mchog de na sku 'khrungs te //
NK040(thi)043:13: yab ni bram ze brtson 'grus go cha can //
NK040(thi)043:14: yum ni bram ze sa ral ta //
NK040(thi)043:15: sras mchog gsum gyi bar ma ni //
NK040(thi)043:16: khyad par drug ldan rin po che //
NK040(thi)043:17: yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
NK040(thi)043:18: thugs dam bskang phyir spyan 'dren nas //
NK040(thi)043:19: mchod pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)043:20: yab yum de gnyis sras bu ni //
NK040(thi)043:21: 'bring ba dam pa rgya gar sku //
NK040(thi)043:22: bslab bya tshul khrims che ba ni //
NK040(thi)043:23: dgung lo bcu gsum lon pa'i dus //
NK040(thi)043:24: karma la shi'i gtsug lag tu //
NK040(thi)043:25: rab byung dge tshul sdom pa mdzad //
NK040(thi)043:26: dam pa rgya gar thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)043:27: khyed kyi rtsa ba'i bla ma bka' drin can //
NK040(thi)043:28: gser gling pa yi thugs rnal 'byor lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dang //
NK040(thi)043:29: dbang thob sdom blang bla ma rnams //
NK040(thi)043:30: bskang ngo mchod do thugs de'i slob ma dam pa rin po che //
NK040(thi)043:31: gsang sngags dam tshig srung ba po //
NK040(thi)043:32: byin rlab nus mthu dpag med ldan //
NK040(thi)043:33: dam pa rgya gar thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)043:34: sde snod rgyud sde ma lus mkhyen //
NK040(thi)043:35: rigs pa'i gnas lnga mkhyen pa po //
NK040(thi)043:36: pan+di ta ni chen po ste //
NK040(thi)043:37: dam pa rgya gar thugs 'bras bu dngos grub che ba ni //
NK040(thi)043:38: phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub thob //
NK040(thi)043:39: dam pa rgya gar thugs de nas bod yul dbus su byon //
NK040(thi)043:40: khyed kyi rtsa ba'i bla ma ni //
NK040(thi)043:43: sgra tshad mdzes pa'i skyil krung bzhugs //
NK040(thi)043:44: sku la dar zab sna tshogs gsol //
NK040(thi)043:45: dbu la sgom zhu mdzes par mnab //
NK040(thi)043:46: pad+ma dmar po skyes pa'i thugs gcod brgyud bla ma'i
NK040(thi)043:47: thugs ar+ya de ba'i dam pa rgya gar de nas
NK040(thi)043:49: ri mkhan pa khrod kyi yang dgon nas //
NK040(thi)043:51: mi pham mgon po 'dzam gling rgyan //
NK040(thi)043:52: rje 'gro ba'i mgon po bcom ldan 'das //
NK040(thi)043:53: dus gsum sangs rgyas sras gcig po //
NK040(thi)043:54: mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i bu gcig po //
NK040(thi)043:55: dam pa yongs kyi skyabs gcig po //
NK040(thi)043:56: dam pa rgya gar sku mdog smug nag brjid pa'i sku //
NK040(thi)043:57: dbu skra nag po gyen du 'khyil //
NK040(thi)043:58: spyan mig dmar la zlum pa'i tshul //
NK040(thi)043:59: mche ba dkar po zings se zeng //
NK040(thi)043:60: zhal nas phata sgra lhangs se lhang //
NK040(thi)043:61: rig pa hur la ag tshom dmar //
NK040(thi)043:62: phyag g.yas gser gyi d+aa ma ru //
NK040(thi)043:63: dpa' bo'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)043:64: mi pham mgon po'i mgon po thugs //
NK040(thi)043:65: phyag g.yon mi rkang gling bu 'bud //
NK040(thi)043:66: bar snang khams su 'u ru ru //
NK040(thi)043:67: dpa' mo'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)043:68: dam pa rgya gar rten 'brel ga la bu khra la gzar //
NK040(thi)043:69: rten 'brel bdag po'i thugs sku stod dar dkar lhab lhub g.yo //
NK040(thi)043:70: rgya gar grub chen 'bum gyis bskor //
NK040(thi)043:71: steng na bka' brgyud thibs se thib //
NK040(thi)043:72: g.yas na dpa' bo gar dang ldan //
NK040(thi)043:73: g.yon nas dpa' mo khrabs se khrab //
NK040(thi)043:74: mdun nas dam can dpungs se dpung //
NK040(thi)043:75: rgyab na d+aak+ki shigs se shig /
NK040(thi)043:76: 'og nas gdon tshogs mya la la //
NK040(thi)043:77: rje dam pa sangs rgyas rin po che //
NK040(thi)043:78: byin rlabs chu bo rgyun mi chad //
NK040(thi)043:79: thugs dam bskang ngo dngos grub stsol //
NK040(thi)043:80: rje gzhan las sprul pa mdzad pa'i dus //
NK040(thi)043:81: 'bir ba pa yi cha byed 'gying bag can //
NK040(thi)043:82: rgyal po'i 'dug stong stag gi gdan //
NK040(thi)043:83: phyag g.yas thod pa 'chang gis bkang //
NK040(thi)043:84: phyag g.yon sdig 'dzub nyi ma gtod //
NK040(thi)043:85: spyan rtsa dmar la bar snang gzigs //
NK040(thi)043:86: rus rgyan bsgom thag sku la brgyan //
NK040(thi)043:87: b+hir ba pa yi thugs dam bskang //
NK040(thi)043:88: sprul yang sprul thugs dam pa sangs rgyas rin po che //
NK040(thi)043:89: glang chen ro la rig 'jug mdzad //
NK040(thi)043:90: dam pa nag chung sob la zhug /
NK040(thi)043:91: sprul pa mdzad pa'i thugs dam pa sangs rgyas rin po che //
NK040(thi)043:92: rje gzhan yang sprul pa mdzad pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)043:93: sku mdog smug nag 'jig pa la //
NK040(thi)043:94: phyag g.yas gser gyi d+aa ma ru //
NK040(thi)043:95: g.yon pas thod pa chang gis bskang //
NK040(thi)043:96: zhabs gnyis rdo rje'i skyil krung bzhug /
NK040(thi)043:98: pha nag po chen po gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)043:99: sku mdog nag la smug pa der //
NK040(thi)043:100: chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)043:101: dam pa rgya gar sku stod seng chen 'gying ba 'dra //
NK040(thi)043:102: bdud bzhi zil gyi gnon pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)043:103: dam pa rgya sked pa rdo rje 'khril ba 'dra //
NK040(thi)043:104: de 'khrul gzhi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtag /
NK040(thi)043:105: dam pa sku smad rma bya 'jol ba 'dra //
NK040(thi)043:106: dug lnga zil gyis non pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)043:107: dam pa rgya gar thugs dam zhab gnyis sba bran gshib pa 'dra //
NK040(thi)043:108: de byang chub lam la bsgrod pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)043:109: dam pa rgya gar thugs dam dbu skra nag smug gyen du 'khyil ba de //
NK040(thi)043:110: de mtho ris thar lam bstan pa'i dam pa rgya spyan rtsa dmar la zlum pa de //
NK040(thi)043:111: stong gsum zil gyi non pa'i rtag /
NK040(thi)043:112: dam pa rgya tshems mdog dkar la tshems rtse rno //
NK040(thi)043:113: skye 'chi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)043:114: dam pa phyag bar yang la phyag sen rno //
NK040(thi)043:115: skal ldan thugs rjes 'dren pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)043:116: dam pa rgya gar phyag sor sing phrug 'drims pa 'dra //
NK040(thi)043:117: ser sna'i mdud pa grol ba'i rtags //
NK040(thi)043:118: dam pa rgya gar rje res 'ga' nyin mtshan med par gzims tsa na //
NK040(thi)043:119: chos gnyug ma rgyun chad med pa'i rtags //
NK040(thi)043:120: dam pa rgya gar rje res 'ga' brtul zhugs spyod pa mdzad //
NK040(thi)043:121: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs mdzad pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)043:122: bka' 'khor bar chad sel ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)043:123: dam pa rgya rje re g+ha grong khyer gyis grong nas gzims //
NK040(thi)043:124: gtsang tsog ngo tsha spang ba'i brda' //
NK040(thi)043:125: dam pa rgya gar 'gro ba'i mgon po'i thugs kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
NK040(thi)043:126: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK040(thi)043:127: thugs kyi sras mchog sku sprul rje //
NK040(thi)043:128: mi pham mgon po'i thugs gsung a li ka li'i sgra don rtogs //
NK040(thi)043:129: bka' mdo rgyud dgongs pa thugs su chud //
NK040(thi)043:130: khong brtul zhugs spyod pas 'gro don mdzad //
NK040(thi)043:131: dam pa rgya gar gsung tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam chos gsung //
NK040(thi)043:132: dam pa rin po che'i thugs dam byang chub sems kyi lam sna drang du gsol //
NK040(thi)043:133: dam pa rgya dgos 'dod kun 'byung nor bu'i re ba bskang //
NK040(thi)043:134: dam pa rgya phrin las rten 'brel che ba'i bar chad sel //
NK040(thi)043:135: pha sku lnga yon tan che ba'i thugs pha dam
NK040(thi)043:136: pa rgya pha skye 'chi med pa'i pha 'du 'bral
NK040(thi)043:137: med pa'i pha lhun gyis grub pa'i pha dgos 'dod
NK040(thi)043:138: 'byung ba'i khyed kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni //
NK040(thi)043:139: me tog phreng ba dar gyi chun po dang //
NK040(thi)043:140: rol mo sgra snyan sna tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)043:141: 'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)043:142: bla bre 'phan gdug rgyal mtshan dang //
NK040(thi)043:143: rnga dang b+ha ling gtor ma dang //
NK040(thi)043:144: skyes bu mtshan bzang thod pa dang //
NK040(thi)043:145: bu mo mtshan bzang gnyis dag gi //
NK040(thi)043:146: bcu drug lo lon thod pa gnyis //
NK040(thi)043:147: spyi bo stag sprod rnga sgra 'dis //
NK040(thi)043:148: dam pa rgya gar bud med mkha' 'gro'i mtshan tshang ba //
NK040(thi)043:149: smin mtshams gras pa'i ka pa lar //
NK040(thi)043:150: rin chen sman chang bdud rtsi'i bkang //
NK040(thi)043:151: dam pa rgya gri rkang gling bu glang sna can //
NK040(thi)043:153: dam pa rgya gar rin chen gser gyi d+aa ma ru //
NK040(thi)043:154: dar sna lnga yi brgyan pa 'di //
NK040(thi)043:155: dam pa rgya gar cang te'u thod pa'i rnga sgra 'di //
NK040(thi)043:156: dam pa rgya gar sman sna dri bzang spos dud 'di //
NK040(thi)043:157: dam pa rgya gar snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis dam pa sangs rgyas b+ha ling 'phan dar btsug pa 'di //
NK040(thi)043:158: dam pa sangs rgyas thod zhal b+han+d+ha 'di dag dang //
NK040(thi)043:159: gser zhal g.yu zhal dngul zhal 'di //
NK040(thi)043:160: dam pa sangs rgyas tshogs kyi gar thabs mchod pa 'di //
NK040(thi)043:161: dam pa rus brgyan dngul gyi dril bu 'di //
NK040(thi)043:162: dam pa sangs rgyas bdag gi sha khrag phung po 'di //
NK040(thi)043:163: rig pa mkha' la spar nas kyang //
NK040(thi)043:164: sha khrag bdud rtsir dmigs pa 'di //
NK040(thi)043:165: lpags pa gser gyi sa gzhi la //
NK040(thi)043:166: nang rol yang dag tshom bur bkod //
NK040(thi)043:168: rje dam pa sangs rgyas gcod brgyud bla ma rnams
NK040(thi)043:169: kyi thugs pha brgyud dpa' bo'i tshogs kyi rgya gar
NK040(thi)043:170: grub chen rnams kyi rkyen dang bar chad med par
NK040(thi)043:171: mdzod // bdag cag mkha' spyod gnas su lam sna drangs //
NK040(thi)043:172: gal te 'chi ba'i dus byung na //
NK040(thi)043:173: mi pham mgon pos lam sna drongs //
NK040(thi)043:174: khyed kyi sku yi 'od zer gyi //
NK040(thi)043:175: bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun mthing ka li //
NK040(thi)043:176: bdag gi lus la smin par mdzod //
NK040(thi)043:177: 'dir tshogs skal ldan pho mo rnams //
NK040(thi)043:178: dpa' bo dpa' mor byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)043:180: mkha' spyod gnas su byin gyis barlobasa //
NK040(thi)043:181: khyed kyi sku yi byin rlabs lus la zhugs //
NK040(thi)043:182: lus la bde drod 'bar du gsol //
NK040(thi)043:183: gsung gi byin rlab ngag la zhugs //
NK040(thi)043:184: ngag la nus pa 'bar du gsol //
NK040(thi)043:185: thugs kyi byin rlab sems la zhugs //
NK040(thi)043:186: sems chos sku thob par mdzad du gsol //
NK040(thi)043:187: rkyen dang bar chad thams cad bzlog /
NK040(thi)043:188: bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par mdzod //
